trans-unit.source: Defines a region for content in an ASP.NET master page.
trans-unit.target: 为 ASP.NET 母版页中的内容定义区域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control defines a relative region for content in a master page, and renders all text, markup, and server controls from a related <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control found in a content page.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控件在主页面中，定义内容的相对区域并呈现所有文本、 标记和服务器控件从相关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>在内容页中找到的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> using its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> property.

Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the related <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control in a master page.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content.ContentPlaceHolderID%2A>属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>将相关属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>在母版页中的控件。

trans-unit.source: More than one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> can be declared in a master page.
Within a content page, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control can supply the content for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> in the master page.
trans-unit.target: 在内容页中，只有一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控件可以提供的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>母版页中。

trans-unit.source: However, in each content page that uses a master page, you can have separate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> controls associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在每个使用母版页的内容页，你可以单独<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>与关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can define the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> for the page title in a master page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>页标题在母版页中。

trans-unit.source: For each content page that uses the master page, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control that supplies the text and markup for the page title.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个使用母版页的内容页，你可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>提供文本和页标题的标记的控件。

trans-unit.source: For XHTML compliance, an empty title element is created if a title has not been defined or cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 的符合性，如果标题未定义或无法找到，则创建空的标题元素。

trans-unit.source: You can specify default content placed within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control tags, but this content is replaced by any content in an associated content page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定默认内容放在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控制标记，但此内容替换为关联的内容页中的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: For more information about master pages and content pages, see [DEL: ASP.NET Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0852291d-6f62-4e9f-a809-45cc81e78d6b).
trans-unit.target: 有关母版页和内容页的详细信息，请参阅[DEL: ASP.NET 母版页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0852291d-6f62-4e9f-a809-45cc81e78d6b)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control is used to define a content region for a master page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控制用于定义母版页的内容区域。

trans-unit.source: The first Web page is a master page, and defines a content region using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 Web 页母版页，并定义内容区域使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a content page for the preceding master page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示上述母版页的内容页。

trans-unit.source: The text, markup, and any server controls defined within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> control template are rendered to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> on the master page.
trans-unit.target: 文本、 标记和所有服务器控件中定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控件模板均会呈现给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>母版页上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder" /> 类的新实例。
